pullrequest.title: Add support for playing Actor animation

content.raw:
I made a chain of PRs to bump rendering and gazebo to version 3. Will work with @{557058:ad32c2b0-bebb-403e-b385-c3c1f7aa1d09} to retarget this PR.

## ign-rendering

* ~~[Forward porting version 2 to default](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/182/merge-2-default/diff)~~
* ~~[homebrew](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/804)~~

## ign-sensors

* ~~[Forward porting version 2 to default](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/87/merge-2-default/diff)~~
* ~~[Depend on ign-rendering3](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/88/depend-on-ign-rendering3/diff)~~
* ~~[gazebodistro](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/45/sensors3-depend-on-rendering3/diff)~~
* ~~[release-tools](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/862/sensors3-depend-on-rendering3/diff)~~
* ~~[homebrew](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/801)~~

## ign-gui

* ~~[Forward porting version 2 to default](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/219/merge-2-default/diff)~~
* ~~[Bump to 3.0.0](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/220/bump-default-to-300-pre1/diff)~~
* ~~[Depend on ign-rendering3](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/221/depend-on-ign-rendering3/diff)~~
* ~~[gazebodistro](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/44/ign-gui3/diff)~~
* ~~[release-tools](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/863/gui3-depend-on-rendering3/diff)~~
* ~~[homebrew](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/802)~~

## ign-gazebo

* ~~[Forward porting version 2 to default](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/409/merge-2-default/diff)~~
* ~~[Bump to 3.0.0](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/410/bump-default-to-300-pre1/diff)~~
* ~~[Depend on version 3](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/411/depend-on-ign-rendering3-ign-gui3-ign/diff)~~
* ~~[gazebodistro](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/46/ign-gazebo3/diff)~~
* ~~[release-tools](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/864/gazebo3-depend-on-rendering3-sensors3-and/diff)~~
* ~~[homebrew](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/803)~~
content.html:
I made a chain of PRs to bump rendering and gazebo to version 3. Will work with @mingfei sun to retarget this PR.

ign-rendering

  • Forward porting version 2 to default
  • homebrew

ign-sensors

  • Forward porting version 2 to default
  • Depend on ign-rendering3
  • gazebodistro
  • release-tools
  • homebrew

ign-gui

  • Forward porting version 2 to default
  • Bump to 3.0.0
  • Depend on ign-rendering3
  • gazebodistro
  • release-tools
  • homebrew

ign-gazebo

  • Forward porting version 2 to default
  • Bump to 3.0.0
  • Depend on version 3
  • gazebodistro
  • release-tools
  • homebrew
